==== Notes ====

===== Power management =====
Large battery is discharged suddenly sometimes.

===== Suspend to RAM =====
* Keyboard and touchpad not work after resume. To fix this issue you can use <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-1035792.html|this solution]]</nowiki>.
* Wired NIC adapter still not work after resume (if you use it before suspend).

===== Keys =====

* Fn+F1 shortcut must be assigned to some action manualy
* Mute hardware doesn't change color
* DVD onscreen button send keycode 389. You can remap it to keycode <255 via setkeycodes.
* Rotate and Gear onscreen buttons not work

===== Touchscreen =====

Replace content of /usr/share/hal/fdi/policy/20thirdparty/10-linuxwacom.fdi file like this (you may need calibrate touchscreen):
<pre>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- -*- SGML -*- -->

<deviceinfo version="0.2">
  <device>
    <match key="input.originating_device" contains="if0">
	<match key="info.product" contains="Wacom">
		<merge key="input.x11_driver" type="string">wacom</merge>
		<merge key="input.x11_options.Type" type="string">stylus</merge>
		<merge key="info.product" type="string">stylus</merge>
		<append key="info.callouts.add" type="strlist">hal-setup-wacom</append>
          	<append key="wacom.types" type="strlist">eraser</append>
		<merge key="input.x11_options.BottomY" type="string">16300</merge>
		<merge key="input.x11_options.BottomX" type="string">26300</merge>
		<merge key="input.x11_options.TopY" type="string">230</merge>
		<merge key="input.x11_options.TopX" type="string">230</merge>
	</match>
    </match>
  </device>
  <device>
    <match key="input.originating_device" contains="if1">
	<match key="info.product" contains="Wacom">
		<merge key="input.x11_driver" type="string">wacom</merge>
		<merge key="input.x11_options.Type" type="string">touch</merge>
		<merge key="info.product" type="string">touch</merge>
		<merge key="input.x11_options.BottomY" type="string">3880</merge>
		<merge key="input.x11_options.BottomX" type="string">4000</merge>
		<merge key="input.x11_options.TopY" type="string">200</merge>
		<merge key="input.x11_options.TopX" type="string">186</merge>
	</match>
    </match>
  </device>
  <device>
	<match key="input.x11_options.Type" contains="eraser">
	  <merge key="info.product" type="string">eraser</merge>
	</match>
  </device>
</deviceinfo>
</pre>
